name: Full Colour Tiles (itch)
description:
TV, laptop, mobl friendly puzzle game created to test your power of logic.

Complete each level by turning all the tiles to a single colour. All levels can be completed in 4 moves or less if you are skilled enough.

Good luck!!! Features:

  • 60 challenges to start, with more coming soon.
  • Complete each level casually for a bronze or silver medal, or try and beat the game with all golds!
  • Minimalistic visual and audio style.
  • We will never add adverts to get in the way of your Zen puzzling.
  • Appropriate for all ages.
